update app_information set app_name = #{appName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, app_spell = #{appSpell,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, package_name = #{packageName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, dev_id = #{devId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, dev_name = #{devName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, channel_id = #{channelId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, top_category = #{topCategory,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, category = #{category,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, description = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, version = #{version,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, versioncode = #{versioncode,jdbcType=INTEGER}, icon = #{icon,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, icon_type = #{iconType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, images = #{images,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, download = #{download,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, size = #{size,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, updated = #{updated,jdbcType=INTEGER}, created = #{created,jdbcType=INTEGER}, prority = #{prority,jdbcType=INTEGER}, remarks = #{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, label = #{label,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, md5 = #{md5,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, star = #{star,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, orientation = #{orientation,jdbcType=INTEGER} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select:
SELECT * FROM ( SELECT a.*, GROUP_CONCAT(d.channel_name) channel_name FROM ( SELECT i.id, i.app_name, i.app_spell, i.status, i.created, count(d.id) count FROM app_information i LEFT JOIN app_download d ON d.app_id = i.id GROUP BY i.id ) a LEFT JOIN app_channel_list c ON c.app_id = a.id LEFT JOIN app_channel d ON d.id = c.channel_id GROUP BY a.id ) a
order by ${example.orderByClause}
